Title: Object: Joseph returning from Egypt
Description: The return from Egypt, derived from Rubens; the Holy Family walking to left, with the Virgin leading Christ by the hand and St Joseph leading a donkey and gesturing to right. Mezzotint with some etching
Curator's comments: The composition descends from Vosterman's engraving after Rubens.
Bibliographic references: Chaloner Smith 1883 / British Mezzotinto portraits from the introduction of the art to the early part of the present century (undescribed)
Russell 1926 / English Mezzotint Portraits and their states: Catalogue of Corrections of and Additions to Chaloner Smith's "British Mezzotinto Portraits" (undescribed)
Schneevoogt 1873 / Catalogue des estampes gravées d'après P.P.Rubens (undescribed)
